name: Hoth™ Medical Chamber
description: Bring Luke back to health in the bacta tank!Thanks for your review. I'm sorry to hear you had a disappointing experience with your set. It does sound like a little troubleshooting is in order. If you take apart the set and rebuild it, you should have better results. And you can always get in touch with our brick experts at LEGO.comService if you need a hand.
